Summary.summary: The negotiation for the Enterprise Data Analytics Platform is in the final pricing phase. The seller has significantly dropped the price from $150k to $120k but the buyer is holding firm at $100k, citing a competitor quote of $110k. A critical deadline of Dec 15th for contract signature is approaching. The buyer has high leverage due to the competitive market.

Negotiation Status & Health.leverage_reasoning: Strong competitor offer and buyer's firm budget boundary.
Negotiation Status & Health.walk_away_readiness: Seller is moderately ready to walk away below $115k.

Research-Backed Response Strategies.market_context_summary: The enterprise analytics market is highly competitive, with a trend toward value-based pricing rather than feature parity. Competitors are aggressively discounting for year-end deals.

strategies (list of StrategyOption objec.name: Anchor on Value/ROI
strategies (list of StrategyOption objec.description: Stop discussing price. Re-quantify the ROI of the $120k offer, focusing on the unique HIPAA and advanced features that Competitor X lacks.

strategies (list of StrategyOption objec.name: Split the Difference Compromise
strategies (list of StrategyOption objec.description: Offer a final price of $110,000, matching Competitor X's quote and claiming this as the absolute final offer.

Research-Backed Response Strategies.best_strategy_recommendation: Anchor on Value/ROI. The seller is near the floor; further price drops risk eroding value perception.
